transArray.content:
The hotel location is very convenient
The service attitude is also very good and the beds were upgraded.
The facilities are new and the breakfast is also good. I have always liked All Seasons游때游때游때游때游때

Passing through the years, meeting time, meeting vegetation, meeting the past, it is the beauty that settles in the quiet place of time. Your recognition is a great honor for Xiaoji, and Xiaoji is looking forward to you.
